title: New: Liyv – Splintered Arms
body:
This is mesmerising.

Seattle’s **Liyv** is releasing one song a month, and her latest offering, _Splintered Arms_ is wonderfully composed yet poignantly fragile, likely to draw comparisons to the likes of Kiiara and the early Lapsley demos. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
